cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 6th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 6th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This double room is a stand alone cabin at the back of the main building, about 10m away. You use the backpackers facilities for your cooking, bathroom and communal living.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 6th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 6th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
